instruction: Promote the book given its description.
input: This horror novel follows a group of childhood friends brought together through a terrifying game of hide-and-seek as moonlit shadows reach deep into the night.
output: Unlock the mysteries of the night with the suspenseful horror novel, which follows a group of childhood friends battling supernatural forces in a game of hide-and-seek. Feel the terror as moonlit shadows reach out for you with each new page. Get your copy today for spine-tingling thrills!
